description: Structured information on a computational model (version level).
label: Model version
name: ModelVersion

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/acces._instruction: Add the accessibility of the data for this research product version.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/acces.description: Level to which something is accessible to someone or something.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/acces.label: Accessibility
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/acces.name: accessibility

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/copyr._instruction: Add the copyright information of this research product version.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/copyr.description: Exclusive and assignable legal right of an originator to reproduce, publish, sell, or distribute the matter and form of a creative work for a defined time period.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/copyr.label: Copyright
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/copyr.name: copyright

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/custo._instruction: Add one or several custodians (person or organization) that are responsible for this research product version.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/custo.description: The 'custodian' is a legal person who is responsible for the content and quality of the data, metadata, and/or code of a research product.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/custo.label: Custodian
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/custo.name: custodian

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/descr._instruction: If necessary, enter a version specific description (abstract) for this research product version (max. 2000 characters, incl. spaces; no references). If left blank, the research product version will inherit the 'description' of it's corresponding research product.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/descr.description: Longer statement or account giving the characteristics of someone or something.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/descr.label: Description
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/descr.name: description

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/devel._instruction: If necessary, add one or several developers (person or organization) that contributed to the code implementation of this model version. Note that these developers will overwrite the once provided in the model product this version belongs to.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/devel.description: Legal person that creates or improves products or services (e.g., software, applications, etc.).
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/devel.label: Developer
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/devel.name: developer

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/digit._instruction: Add the globally unique and persistent digital identifier of this research product version.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/digit.description: Digital handle to identify objects or legal persons.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/digit.label: Digital identifier
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/digit.name: digitalIdentifier

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/forma._instruction: Add the used content type of this model version.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/forma.description: Method of digitally organizing and structuring data or information.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/forma.label: Format
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/forma.name: format

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/fullD._instruction: Add the DOI, file or URL that points to a full documentation of this research product version.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/fullD.description: Non-abridged instructions, comments, and information for using a particular product.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/fullD.label: Full documentation
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/fullD.name: fullDocumentation

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/fullN._instruction: If necessary, enter a version specific descriptive full name (title) for this research product version. If left blank, the research product version will inherit the 'fullName' of it's corresponding research product.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/fullN.description: Whole, non-abbreviated name of something or somebody.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/fullN.label: Full name
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/fullN.name: fullName

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/fundi._instruction: Add all funding information of this research product version.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/fundi.description: Money provided by a legal person for a particular purpose.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/fundi.label: Funding
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/fundi.name: funding

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/homep._instruction: Add the uniform resource locator (URL) to the homepage of this research product version.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/homep.description: Main website of something or someone.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/homep.label: Homepage
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/homep.name: homepage

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/howTo._instruction: Enter the preferred citation text for this research product version. Leave blank if citation text can be extracted from the assigned digital identifier.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/howTo.description: Preferred format for citing a particular object or legal person.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/howTo.label: How to cite
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/howTo.name: howToCite

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/input._instruction: Add the data that was used as input for this model version.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/input.description: Data that is put into a process or machine.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/input.label: Input data
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/input.name: inputData

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/isAlt._instruction: Add all model versions that can be used alternatively to this model version.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/isAlt.description: Reference to an original form where the essence was preserved, but presented in an alternative form.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/isAlt.label: Is alternative version of
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/isAlt.name: isAlternativeVersionOf

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/isNew._instruction: Add the model version preceding this model version.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/isNew.description: Reference to a previous (potentially outdated) particular form of something.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/isNew.label: Is new version of
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/isNew.name: isNewVersionOf

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/keywo._instruction: Enter custom keywords to this research product version.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/keywo.description: Significant word or concept that are representative of something or someone.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/keywo.label: Keyword
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/keywo.name: keyword

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/licen._instruction: Add at least one license for this model version.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/licen.description: Grant by a party to another party as an element of an agreement between those parties that permits to do, use, or own something.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/licen.label: License
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/licen.name: license

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/other._instruction: Add the contributions for each involved person or organization going beyond being an author, custodian or developer of this research product version.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/other.description: Giving or supplying of something (such as money or time) as a part or share other than what is covered elsewhere.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/other.label: Other contribution
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/other.name: otherContribution

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/outpu._instruction: Add the data that was generated as output of this model version.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/outpu.description: Data that comes out of, is delivered or produced by a process or machine.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/outpu.label: Output data
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/outpu.name: outputData

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/relat._instruction: Add further publications besides the documentation (e.g. an original research article) providing the original context for the production of this research product version.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/relat.description: Reference to something that was made available for the general public to see or buy.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/relat.label: Related publication
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/relat.name: relatedPublication

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/relea._instruction: Enter the date (actual or intended) of the first broadcast/publication of this research product version.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/relea.description: Fixed date on which a product is due to become or was made available for the general public to see or buy
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/relea.label: Release date
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/relea.name: releaseDate

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/repos._instruction: Add the file repository of this research product version.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/repos.description: Place, room, or container where something is deposited or stored.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/repos.label: Repository
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/repos.name: repository

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/short._instruction: Enter a short name (alias) for this research product version (max. 30 characters, no space).
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/short.description: Shortened or fully abbreviated name of something or somebody.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/short.label: Short name
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/short.name: shortName

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/suppo._instruction: Enter all channels through which a user can receive support for handling this research product.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/suppo.description: Way of communication used to interact with users or customers.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/suppo.label: Support channel
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/suppo.name: supportChannel

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/versi._instruction: Enter the version identifier of this research product version.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/versi.description: Term or code used to identify the version of something.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/versi.label: Version identifier
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/versi.name: versionIdentifier

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/versi._instruction: Enter a summary/description of the novelties/peculiarities of this research product version in comparison to other versions of it's research product. If this research product version is the first released version, you can enter the following disclaimer 'This is the first version of this research product.'
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/versi.description: Documentation on what changed in comparison to a previously published form of something.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/versi.label: Version innovation
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/versi.name: versionInnovation
